title: Front10 Website
name: front10
description: We do scalable Front-End development 3x faster.

scripts.build: mkdir -p ./public/css && cp -a ./css/. ./public/css && mkdir -p ./public/img && cp -a ./img/. ./public/img && mkdir -p ./public/js && cp -a ./js/. ./public/js && mkdir -p ./public/vendor && cp -a ./vendor/. ./public/vendor && cp index.html ./public/index.html

author: Start Bootstrap
